interest_drivers: Comprehensive documentation for Hugging Face Hub and client libraries
Support for various tasks, including model hosting, dataset management, and deployment
Integration with major cloud providers like AWS and Microsoft Azure
ai_analysis.summary: Hugging Face documentation provides a thorough overview of its platform, highlighting its capabilities in model deployment, dataset management, and integration with major cloud providers, indicating significant technical advances and notable business impact.

changes.title: Hugging Face - Documentation
changes.content_preview:
Title: Hugging Face - Documentation

Hugging Face
Models
Datasets
Spaces
Community
Docs
Enterprise
Pricing
Log In
Sign Up
Documentation
Hub & Client Libraries

Hub

Host Git-based models, datasets, and Spaces on the HF Hub

Hub Python Library

Python client to interact with the Hugging Face Hub

Huggingface.js

JavaScript libraries for Hugging Face with built-in TS types

Tasks

Explore demos, models, and datasets for any ML tasks

Dataset viewer

API for metadata, stats, and content of HF Hub datasets

Deployment & Inference

Inference Providers

Call 200k+ models hosted by our 10+ Inference partners

Inference Endpoints (dedicated)

Deploy models on dedicated & fully managed infrastructure on HF

Deploying on AWS

Train/deploy models from Hugging Face to AWS with DLCs

Text Generation Inference

Serve language models with TGI optimized toolkit

Text Embeddings Inference

Serve embeddings models with TEI optimized toolkit

Microsoft Azure

Deploy Hugging Face models on Microsoft Azure

Integration with major cloud providers like AWS and Microsoft Azure

interest_drivers: Large model repository with 1M+ models
Community-driven platform with trending models and applications
Diverse range of AI apps and tools, including text-to-speech and image editing
ai_analysis.summary: Hugging Face is a prominent AI community platform that showcases a vast repository of models, datasets, and applications. The platform's technical innovation and business impact are significant, driven by its large community, trending models, and diverse range of AI apps.

interest_drivers: Pricing model for AI platform
Tiered subscription plans
Features for teams and enterprises
ai_analysis.summary: Hugging Face introduces a pricing page with PRO and Team plans, offering features like increased storage, inference credits, and granular access control, indicating a focus on monetization and enterprise adoption.
